commit message: Fixed NPE when subscribing to a new feed and selecting a category
Removed remaining references to the preference 'Use old connector'
Split up recalculation of counters in smaller transactions to allow other tasks to run in between

Use https if downloadurl has a prefix/scheme of just '//'

Fixes issue 301. We might just get a '//' as prefix, e.g. when both, HTTP and
HTTPs is possible. In this case we use a sane default, https:

Merge pull request #304 from idl0r/for-upstream

Use https if downloadurl has a prefix/scheme of just '//'

Tried to implement productFlavors for Issue #288
- added 'fdroid' and 'play' flavors and extended from MenuFlavorActivity from the corresponding flavor
- pushed play-services-base version to 8.1.0

Also allow ftp downloads

Controller.getInstance().openConnection(url) already returns a URLConnection
which can be HTTP(s) or FTP so lets stick with it.

FTP URLs are also valid for the image cacher.

Extend findImageUrlsPattern Pattern

There might be 'img' or even 'video' tags.

Refactor schemeless URL handling

Schemeless URLs are now translated as early as possible, so when fetching the
data from the tt-rss instance. We now check attachments, article content,
article url and comment url.
Android treated some of those schemeless URLs as 'file://' which caused
some trouble.

Fixed Issue #305: 'Problem when serves doesn't use credentials'
Show the dialog only once regardless of the configuration of a server

- Avoid NPE
- Remove Notification when cancelled. After 30 minutes no one cares anymore anyway.

Fix Issue #308: How to stream a media file
- Added third option, 'Choose player app' which opens a chooser with a list of available applications
Adjusted text-colors and article background for better readablity
Removed unnecessary checks for markedRead = true, could never be false anyway

Merge pull request #306 from idl0r/for-upstream

Change handling of urls starting with '//' and allow ftp downloads
